lead_magnet.title: The 'Bulletproof' Tashkent Rental Contract Template (Bilingual Uzb/Rus)
lead_magnet.description: Don't let your landlord raise the rent next month just because 'dollar oshdi' (dollar went up). This legally-vetted PDF template protects your rights, deposits, and price for 12 months. Free download inside the bot.
